# mouseDownFlags

**Instance Property**

The flags in effect at the mouse-down event that started the current tracking session.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var mouseDownFlags: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSMatrix] [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSMatrix/mouseDown(with:)] method obtains these flags by sending a [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSEvent/modifierFlags-swift.property] message to the event passed into [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSMatrix/mouseDown(with:)]. Use this property if you want to access these flags. This property is valid only during tracking; it isn’t useful if the target of the receiver initiates another tracking loop as part of its action method (as a cell that pops up a pop-up list does, for example).

- **acceptsFirstMouse(for:)**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the receiver accepts the first mouse.
- **mouseDown(with:)**: Responds to a mouse-down event.
